year Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh has just signed a

born
in Hanoi city,
according to investigation results from April

Hanoi Highway.  From Ho Chi
Minh City to Dong Nai, when reaching the intersection with

Duc City, the driver of the cheap car had to
enter Street 13 while taking a turn and collided

and two small children were thrown out and the
husband was thrown out.  and the motorbike was stuck under the
container. The victims were then taken to the

Rach Chiet traffic police team was present. Handling the
scene and relocating two
vehicles. At noon, there was a Lien Hoang car crash in the
middle of the year.  car accident occurred in
Thuan An city, Binh Duong province, no
casualties were recorded, but three cars were
seriously damaged.
According to initial information, at
11:00 a.m., a truck carrying filtered water was driving on
road dt743 in the direction  from Tan Uyen city
to Thuan An city. When arriving at An
Phu ward, he crashed into the back of a five-seat car. Running in the
same direction, the three-touch collision
caused the five-seat car to rush forward and hit
a seven-seat car.  Pushing
this vehicle, it continued to suck into another five-
seater vehicle that did not stop. The five-seater vehicle that had
just been hit continued to drive and hit
the back of a pickup truck, creating a chain of
collisions. Lien Hoang had five vehicles at the scene where
five vehicles were involved.  tightly together, in which two
five-seater cars and one seven-seater car were
seriously damaged. They received news that Thuan An city police were
present to organize an investigation of the
scene to investigate the cause of the impact from
the scene causing traffic to pass through the area.  The area was
congested for many hours until 5:00 p.m. The
accident scene was only processed
later [music] in Binh Phuoc around 1900.
Last night, the motorbike with license plate number 93 p2 5595 7 was
driven by a man about 50 years old.
traveling on Highway 14 from
Dong Xa city to Dac Nhiem province when arriving at
Tan Thien ward, Dong Chi city,
suddenly hit an electric bicycle

After investigating, the police agency

Finally, this person told the police

the cav did not stop to treat the

Duong, Lam Dong province, said it

Initially, an unidentified person

At this time, the current was strong. The boat lost its balance and

fire prevention efforts rather than
fire fighting in the capital city of Budapest.  of Hungary is
facing unprecedented floods in
December when the Dan River reached its highest level
in the past 10 years. The
Hungarian General Directorate of Water Management
said the water level of the Dan River peaked at 6.93 m
on December 28.  The 12 agencies noted
that the last time the water level of the Danus River
exceeded 6 m in December was in
1987 but it did not flood the
embankments where cars are currently banned from entering the river embankment and
tram services as well.  only in
some sections near the river outside Budapest the
cities of Karom and Estg are also
facing high water levels. A
state of emergency has been declared in
Hungary on a total of 1200 km Waterway
according to authorities  The situation on the
Dan River and other Hungarian rivers will
stabilize by the end of the week. Experts
say increased rainfall along with
rising temperatures in Northern and Central Europe will cause snow to melt
quickly in the upper reaches of the river, causing
green floods.  earlier in the

Xiaomi has just officially launched

in the

Saomi Technology Group, he said that the sedan name su7
stands for Speed ​​Ultra, meaning

including the Tesla Model s su7 electric car, there will be
two versions, one version has a range
of 668 km on a single charge and
another version has a range of
up to 800 km to compare the Model s model.
Tesla's electric car has a range of 6.6 km.
Su7 is expected to be on the market
in a few months, but the price has
not yet been revealed. Xiaomi's electric car model
launched in the context of the
world's largest automobile market.  The world is facing

enfin festival is held in the church square
